name: Yumi Journey
description:
Hello!, Before you read the old GameJolt desc. let me just say that this is an old game and I'm just putting it on here! I did improve it from the first build but I don't plan on doing anything major on it, maybe some bug fixes, but I would love it if you played my games and/or make content on them! I want my characters and stories to be out there and it would mean the world if you shared it if you liked it!

"Hello Yumi!!! Welcome to your best world!"

Yumi Journey is a puzzle game where you find different paths to different ends. This game has multiple (4) endings and a story behind it all.

This is an updated port of the last port with a graphics overhaul, New artwork, New music, and A new Extra's menu! #puzzle #adventure #RPG #TwinsQuest
